llm.emotional_summary: I'm furious, this application process was a waste of my time.
llm.overall_experience_feedback: This application process was unbelievably frustrating.  I hate this company already and I haven't even gotten the credit card yet!  The form itself was straightforward enough, but that ridiculous error with the comma in my income?  Seriously?  Who designs a form that can't handle a simple comma in a number field?  It's insulting.  I'm only finishing this because I desperately need this card.  The whole thing felt clunky and cheap. I would much rather jump through hoops made of fire than deal with this garbage ever again.
suggestions: Fix your broken validation on the income field.  It should allow commas or handle the input appropriately.
Seriously consider investing in a UX consultant. Your application is clunky and makes a terrible first impression.
